'''Adhigama Wood "Repose" Couch''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Adhigama Wood "Repose" Couch is obtainable by buying the Gnostic Chorus package of the [[Battle Pass/Invoker's Secrets|Invoker's Secrets]] Battle Pass.
